help.desc: This is the help command. Use **WY!help** to get a list of all commands.

choose.desc: Chooses randomly between the choices given.

random.desc: Chooses a random floating point number.

args.1 Number: Chooses between 0 and the number given.
args.2 Numbers: Chooses between the two numbers given.

waluigi.desc: Gives you either the Luigi or the WALUIGI role if available, at random. Removes the unselected role.

work.desc: Use this command to gain points. You will have to wait X minutes to work again, where X is the number of points you get.

easteregg.desc: Find easter eggs and view them here!

args.No Arguments: Shows all flavor text for unfound easter eggs.
args.found: Shows all found easter eggs and how many times they were activated.
args.first: Shows users who found easter eggs first.
args.All other arguments: Tries to find an easter egg. Easter eggs are written in PascalCase with no spaces.
